labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: An internal error is thrown as shown in the attachment, because of reasons explained above (For KockaAdmiralac#9306)
data.expected_result: The webhook is created on a channel that you can manage
data.short_description: If the user doesn't have the permission to manage the general channel of the server, managing webhooks through Server Settings throws an error because it attempts to create the default webhook on the general channel but fails.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have server wide Manage Webhooks permission - Don't have the permission to manage the general channel - Have the permission to access Server Settings - Attempt to create a webhook through server settings
